name: Until The End (PC, Mac, and Linux)
blurb: A run-n-gun zombie survival game where you scavenge for items to make the night a little less scary.

rewards.reward:
ORIGINAL GAME!
-Full Game Reward-
Receive a digital copy of the full game.
Expect to receive your copy of the game in your email near December 8th.

SOUNDTRACK BONUS
-Full Game + Soundtrack Reward-
Receive a digital copy of the game + the full original game soundtrack. 
Expect to receive your copy of the game in your email near December 8th. But expect the soundtrack in your email within a week of Kickstarter completion.

BETA!
-Beta Access Reward-
Receive a digital copy of the Beta within one week of Kickstarter Completion! 
*The Beta will have bugs and glitches and will continuously update until December 8th when it is fully released.

SOUNDTRACK AND BEHIND THE SCENES BONUS!
-Beta Access + Soundtrack + Behind The Scenes Reward-
Receive a digital copy of the Beta + the full original game soundtrack + The Behind the Scenes video which shows the process of making Until The End. 
Expect all of this in your email within one week of the Kickstarter completion.

MAP AND CONCEPT ART BONUS!
-Beta Access + Soundtrack + Behind The Scenes + Digital Map + Concept Art Digital Book-
Receive a digital copy of the Beta + the full original game soundtrack + The Behind the Scenes video + An Exclusive Kickstarter only map + A Kickstarter only PDF file showing several different pieces concept art from the game.  
Expect the Beta, the Soundtrack, and the digital map and concept art within one week of the Kickstarter completion.

SECOND ENDING BONUS!
-Beta Access + Soundtrack + Behind The Scenes + Digital Map + Concept Art Digital Book + Second Ending-
Receive a digital copy of the Beta + the full original game soundtrack + The Behind the Scenes video + A digital map + Digital concept art + An exclusive alternate ending.
Expect the Beta with the ending, the Soundtrack, and the digital map and concept art within one week of the Kickstarter completion.

PERSONAL EASTER EGG BONUS!
-Beta Access + Soundtrack + Behind The Scenes + Digital Map + Concept Art Digital Book + Second Ending + Your Personal Easter Egg-
Receive a digital copy of the Beta + the full original game soundtrack + The Behind the Scenes video + A digital map + Digital concept art + An exclusive alternate ending + Input your own Easter egg / secret for the game. I will talk with you and put your ideas into the full version of the game.
Expect the Beta with the ending, the Soundtrack, and the digital map and concept art within one week of the Kickstarter completion. Expect seeing your secret in the full version of the game.

CUSTOM MAP BONUS!
-Beta Access + Soundtrack + Behind The Scenes + Digital Map + Concept Art Digital Book + Second Ending + Your own map!-
Receive a digital copy of the Beta + the full original game soundtrack + The Behind the Scenes video + A digital map + Digital concept art + An exclusive alternate ending + Communicate with me and I will make your map for the game for others to play! Make it silly, serious, epic, whatever your heart desires!
Expect the Beta with the ending, the Soundtrack, and the digital map and concept art within one week of the Kickstarter completion. Expect your map in the full version of the game.
